channel.title: This Party Sucks | Chalice (BLM/RJE Bundle)
channel.description:
These are the first two games from the [Racial Justice & Equality bundle](https://itch.io/b/520/bundle-for-racial-justice-and-equality) I'm offering in the near future.
![SurReal Estate|690x447](upload://sUGIQnk3G8xICqLW7jJyRUIMK0C.jpeg) **Surreal Estate: A Supernatural House Hunters RPG** Participate in an HGTV-style reality show, combating malevolent forces, and developing your latent ​PSYCHIC POWERS​.
Surreal Estate is designed to be a fairly goofy and non-serious game. However, it incorporates weird and supernatural elements, for which everyone’s preference and tolerance will vary. We will discuss at the start of the session.
Three contestants are shown three houses by the Realtor, but whatever's great about the properties, there's a catch! Each is haunted and the Realtor is a malevolent supernatural being, with strife on their mind!
[Session](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MDtr8qyVblJQzrbr9cZ) [date=2020-09-21 time=20:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2020-09-21 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]
************************************************ ![ScaryMonsters & NiceSprites|611x500](upload://fTHABDzndbcdlXtPxhjpKb61fCa.jpeg) **Scary Monsters & Nice Sprites**
A game of love and intimacy for monsters in a dive at night.
Scary Monsters and Nice Sprites involves all of our characters hanging around at the same, supernaturals only place after dark - a night club, a concert, a bar, a coffeeshop, whatever. For one reason or another, we're there to unwind, chill, and maybe - just maybe, find somebody to spend the night with.
This game is about hooking up at a club, but doing it within the frame of good fun, mutual intimacy, respect and consent!
[Session](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-MDtt8svPte28JrVsAzV) [date=2020-09-28 time=20:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2020-09-28 time=23:30:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]

item.title: This Party Sucks | Chalice (BLM/RJE Bundle)
item.dc:creator: @Donogh
item.description:
@Donogh wrote:

Two more games from the Racial Justice & Equality bundle I’m offering soon.

This Party Sucks
This Party Sucks is a collaborative story game about being a queer and/or trans twentysomething who is (badly) processing a recent breakup. You will play out a piece of their story as they attend a series of three parties while trying (and failing) not to think about their ex. The game encourages a group of three players to laugh, wince, and (possibly) reflect on their own lives and relationships while telling their shared protagonist’s story with honesty and tenderness.

Session: 2020-10-03T19:30:00Z → 2020-10-03T22:30:00Z

Chalice576×864 53.1 KB

Chalice: The Cathedral of Green

Chalice is a collaborative storytelling game about a party of Arthurian knights searching for the Holy Grail.

The game tells the story of the physical and spiritual descent of the knights as they quest for, and ultimately fail to find, the Grail. The knight’s quest is a doomed one of chivalric virtue, undone by their own fatal flaws and moral shortcomings.

Session: 2020-10-10T19:00:00Z → 2020-10-10T22:59:00Z

Read full topic

@Donogh wrote:

These are the first two games from the Racial Justice & Equality bundle I’m offering in the near future.

SurReal Estate823×534 19.3 KB

Surreal Estate: A Supernatural House Hunters RPG
Participate in an HGTV-style reality show, combating malevolent forces, and developing your latent ​PSYCHIC POWERS​.

Surreal Estate is designed to be a fairly goofy and non-serious game. However, it incorporates weird and supernatural elements, for which everyone’s preference and tolerance will vary. We will discuss at the start of the session.

Three contestants are shown three houses by the Realtor, but whatever’s great about the properties, there’s a catch! Each is haunted and the Realtor is a malevolent supernatural being, with strife on their mind!

ScaryMonsters & NiceSprites722×590 50.5 KB

Scary Monsters & Nice Sprites

A game of love and intimacy for monsters in a dive at night.

Scary Monsters and Nice Sprites involves all of our characters hanging around at the same, supernaturals only place after dark - a night club, a concert, a bar, a coffeeshop, whatever. For one reason or another, we’re there to unwind, chill, and maybe - just maybe, find somebody to spend the night with.

This game is about hooking up at a club, but doing it within the frame of good fun, mutual intimacy, respect and consent!
